query: SELECT pl.id, pl.purchaseId, pl.productCode, pl.productDescription, pl.quantity, pl.unleashLineGuid FROM purchaseLines pl JOIN purchases p ON pl.purchaseId = p.id WHERE p.orderNumber = 'SO-U-00000892' ORDER BY pl.id
